title: thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value'
body:
I am getting this error when trying to build from source. I am on Windows 10 with the creators update.

```
PS C:\Users\User\Documents\Source\GitHub\rust> python .\x.py build -vv
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 0.0 secs

running sanity check

stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print
             at C:\projects\rust\src\libstd\sys_common\backtrace.rs:94
```
